title: President visits Parliament on Day 2 of the Crisis Debate
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa made a visit to the Parliament on Thursday (7).
The President was welcomed with applause from the government MPs who were present in the house.
The visit by the Head of State came when Parliament was debating the present crisis situation for the second day.
President must go for us to consider any proposal – Anura Kumara
